message.content:
cs.SI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.SD, cs.CL

The paper deals with analyzing social relationships among users based on their adoption behavior data. This falls under the category of social network analysis, which is a subfield of machine learning and data mining. The use of Linear Dynamical Topic Model (LDTM) to capture the dynamics of users' adoption behaviors in latent space suggests that the paper could also be categorized under topics such as latent variable models (cs.LG), information retrieval (cs.IR), and natural language processing (cs.CL). The bibliographic data used in the experiments also suggests a possible connection to the subfield of scientometrics (cs.SD). Overall, the most likely sub-category is cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
